item.title: Elixir binding for lager
item.description: ExLager Embeds logging calls to ExLager into a module if currently configured logging level is less or equal than severity of a call. Otherwise no code is emmited. Therefore it doesn’t have any negative impact on performance of a production system when you configure error level even if you have tons of debug messages.
